1453 Listen and choose the correct sentence. Listen to Becky.

What can we say about Becky? {{c1::She likes living in London.}} She likes living in London. / She'd like to live in London. [sound:036_A_18.mp3] "
column2: >Q: Where do you live, Becky? In a city? In a village?
column3: >B: In London.
column4: >Q: Are you happy living there? Do you like it?
column5: >B: Yes, I do. There's so much going on, so much to do. It's an international city, and I like that. It's a great place to live. I wouldn't want to live anywhere else."
